name: Remi The Hive Spy!
description:
For the 32Bit game jam, I and two others have created an N64-style 3D platformer in just two weeks! Made with the Godot Game engine.

Help Remi get back the honey recipe that was stolen by a rival hive!

The Team:

Myself: Enoh32

Cobra!: (Will be edited in once I know)

FordAudioDesign: https://fordaudiodesign.itch.io/

Please drop my teammates a follow as they made this jam entry possible.

Game has Controller support!

Controls (PC):

WASD - Move

Space - Jump / Hover(hold)

E - Target nearest enemy

LMB(Left Mouse Button) - Shoot gun
